cause.description:
I'm taking the great Sensenbrenner's place whenever he steps down. I'm a grassroots AMERICAN, and so what else do you need to know!?
By the way...I cannot run till like a billion years, so keep me in mind for the future, plus I'm just really bored right now! But see- I'm even productive whenever I'm bored!
Vote 4 Me!
1. to clean up the streets, and make everyone united and one- because we are all Americans afterall!
2. to bring 'god' back- whether it's the christian one or another religion's view on the three letter word
3. to preserve the land, and keep it from being all developed
cause.mission: elect Joanna to represent the great people of southeastern Wisconsin!
cause.name: Joanna 4 Congress
